name: Hunter's Dagger+
description: Sword that uses only incredibly pure ore to improve offensive abilities.

name: Assassin's Dagger
description: Sword that uses only incredibly pure ore to improve offensive abilities.

name: Snake Bite
description: Made from Giaprey materials. The more it is forged, the stronger it becomes.

name: Bone Kris+
description: Improved Bone Sword. Very durable, and its materials are easily found.

name: Chief Kris
description: Improved Bone Sword. Very durable, and its materials are easily found.

name: Tarnished Sword
description: A tarnished sword that isn't good for much as-is. But if you polish it...

name: Velocidrome Bite
description: A powerful one-handed Sword crafted from newly developed techniques and materials.

name: Velocidrome Bite+
description: A powerful one-handed Sword crafted from newly developed techniques and materials.

name: Kitchen Knife
description: The soul of a chef. 'The art of cooking is about love, not war!

name: Frost Edge
description: Made from Ice Crystals that have stood the test of time over many millennia.

name: Snake Bite+
description: Made from Giaprey materials. The more it is forged, the stronger it becomes.

name: Viper Bite
description: Upgraded serpent blade made from Genprey. Contains paralyzing Genprey Fang.

name: Crimson Club
description: Club shaped sword made from a blood red horn. Stunningly sharp and powerful.

name: Thunderbane
description: Uses the Electro Sac of a Khezu to electrically charge the blade.

name: Poison Battleaxe
description: This Axe's bone blade is soaked in the toxins of poisonous monster organs.

name: Hydra Bite
description: Upgraded serpent blade made with Ioprey materials. Contains poison Ioprey Fang.

name: Monoblos Club
description: Club shaped sword made from a blood red horn. Stunningly sharp and powerful.

name: Weary Finsword
description: Made from Plesioth Fin. Puts pierced enemies to sleep with a powerful toxin.

name: Red Saber
description: A blade crafted from the flames of Rathalos. It carries a faint glow of red.

name: Melynx Tool
description: A Melynx favorite club. Simply holding it will make thievery second nature.

name: Frightbane
description: Uses the Electro Sac of a Khezu to electrically charge the blade.

name: Upper Battleaxe
description: The interior of this one handed Axe is a dreadfully potent poison factory.

name: Iron Chefblade
description: The soul of a chef. 'The art of cooking is about love, not war!

name: Millennium Knife
description: Ultimate kitchen knife. A millennium is a long time, so never neglect a thing.

name: Frost Edge+
description: Made from Ice Crystals that have stood the test of time over many millennia.

name: Deathprize
description: Upgraded serpent blade made from Genprey. Contains paralyzing Genprey Fang.

name: Deadly Poison
description: Upgraded serpent blade made with Ioprey materials. Contains poison Ioprey Fang.

name: Studded Club
description: Made from a hard Diablos Horn and studded with fangs. High attack power.

name: Sandman Finsword
description: Made from Plesioth Fin. Puts pierced enemies to sleep with a powerful toxin.

name: Djinn
description: A blade crafted from the flames of Rathalos. It carries a faint glow of red.

name: Catburglar
description: Improved Catspaw."Meow meow meow meow." -A famed Melynx

name: Shaka Poison Bite
description: Used by the Shakalakas. The shield's brush is used to apply poison to the blade.

name: Raven Blade
description: A black Sword made from Yian Garuga materials. The edge easily shreds its victims.

name: Kirin Bolt Indora
description: A Sword capable of manipulating the power of wind and thunder.

name: Ninja Sword
description: Despite its short, thin blade, this small sword is useful in fighting wyverns.

name: Princess Rapier
description: Made from Rathian materials, this is the latest entry in the poison sword line.

name: Spiked Bat
description: Made from a hard Diablos Horn and studded with fangs. High attack power.

name: Kirin Bolt
description: The horn of Kirin. Grip is covered with Gypceros hide for insulation.

name: Kirin Bolt+
description: Improved Kirin Bolt. Uses Kirin Mane as an electrical amplifier.

name: Sandman Spike
description: A sleeping curved blade. Its neurotoxin can send an enemy off to their nightmares.

name: Blazing Falchion
description: Improved Djinn. Blazes with a heat as intense as molten rock.

name: Corona
description: Not very powerful, but makes good use of the flame power potential of its materials.

name: Flame Syphos
description: Fire Sword tinted black with rage. The black shape is said to be a volcano king.

name: Master's Replica
description: Replica of the Sword used by the Hero of Kokoto. The best replica possible.

name: Eternal Replica
description: Replica of Sword discovered in Jumbo Village. Reproduces the power as best it can.

name: Eternal Strife
description: Weaponsmiths of old worked 108 days straight to make this legendary Dragonsword.

name: Steel Ice Dagger
description: Sword and shield holding the power of Daora. Used by the icy kings of northern lands.

description: A powerful one-handed Sword crafted from newly developed techniques and materials.
